attributes.action: Do not help shareholders whose shares have plumetted.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Buying shares is like gambling on a horse, some you win, some you loose. If you take a gamble then you need to deal with the risk.
When your shares are reduced in value the TAX PAYER SHOULD NOT be called to help you with YOUR bad investment.
You gambled and you lost.
No one helps a guy whose horse has lost a race.
No one seems to be helping savers get higher interest rates, so please lets not bail out failed shareholders.
